name: R4B-ServiceRequest-R5-ServiceRequest
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B ServiceRequest into FHIR R5

element.display: A request for a service to be performed

target.display: A request for a service to be performed
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest`
R4B `ServiceRequest.asNeeded[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.asNeeded[x]`
R4B `ServiceRequest.authoredOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.authoredOn`
R4B `ServiceRequest.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.basedOn`
R4B `ServiceRequest.bodySite` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.bodySite`
R4B `ServiceRequest.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.category`
R4B `ServiceRequest.code` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `ServiceRequest.code` - code has change due to type change: R4B code CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 code
R4B `ServiceRequest.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.contained`

element.display: True if service/procedure should not be performed

target.display: True if service/procedure should not be performed
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.doNotPerform` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.doNotPerform`

element.display: Encounter in which the request was created

target.display: Encounter in which the request was created
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.encounter`
R4B `ServiceRequest.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ServiceRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `ServiceRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.id`
R4B `ServiceRequest.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.implicitRules`
R4B `ServiceRequest.instantiatesCanonical` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.instantiatesCanonical`
R4B `ServiceRequest.instantiatesUri` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.instantiatesUri`
R4B `ServiceRequest.insurance` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.insurance`

element.display: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.intent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.intent` - intent has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `ServiceRequest.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ServiceRequest.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `ServiceRequest.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.meta`

R4B `ServiceRequest.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ServiceRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `ServiceRequest.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `ServiceRequest.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`
R4B `ServiceRequest.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.occurrence[x]`

R4B `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` - orderDetail removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/servicerequest-orderdetail; orderDetail has change due to type change: R4B orderDetail CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 orderDetail

R4B `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` - patientInstruction changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); patientInstruction has change due to type change: R4B patientInstruction string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 patientInstruction
R4B `ServiceRequest.performer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.performer`
R4B `ServiceRequest.performerType` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.performerType`

R4B `ServiceRequest.priority` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

R4B `ServiceRequest.quantity[x]` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `ServiceRequest.quantity[x]` - quantity[x] has change due to type change: R4B `quantity[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `quantity[x]`
R4B `ServiceRequest.relevantHistory` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.relevantHistory`
R4B `ServiceRequest.replaces` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.replaces`
R4B `ServiceRequest.requester` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.requester`
R4B `ServiceRequest.requisition` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.requisition`
R4B `ServiceRequest.specimen` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.specimen`

element.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

target.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Individual or Entity the service is ordered for

target.display: Individual or Entity the service is ordered for
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.subject`

R4B `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` - supportingInfo has change due to type change: R4B supportingInfo Reference has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 supportingInfo

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `ServiceRequest.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ServiceRequest.text`
